sentences.en: a keen photographer
sentences.cn: 一个摄影迷

sentences.en: a keen sportsman
sentences.cn: 热心运动的人

sentences.en: a keen understanding of commerce
sentences.cn: 对商业敏锐的理解力

sentences.en: Brand's keen ear caught the trace of an accent.
sentences.cn: 布兰德敏锐的耳朵听出了口音。

sentences.en: Caroline was keen to make her marital home in London.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳渴望婚后把家安在伦敦。

sentences.en: Dogs have a very keen sense of smell.
sentences.cn: 狗的嗅觉十分灵敏。

sentences.en: Firms are now keen to hold on to the people they recruit.
sentences.cn: 各公司现在都急切地想要留住招聘来的员工。

sentences.en: He had retained a keen interest in the progress of the work.
sentences.cn: 他对那项工作的进展一直很关心。

sentences.en: He has had a keen and lifelong interest in astrological research.
sentences.cn: 他毕生热衷于占星术研究。

sentences.en: He took a keen interest in his grandson's education.
sentences.cn: 他对孙子的教育很感兴趣。

sentences.en: I am not keen for her to have a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 我不太放心她有辆自行车。

sentences.en: I can see you have a keen sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 我能看出你极具幽默感。

sentences.en: Keen skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 滑雪爱好者乐于利用暑期假日去滑雪。

sentences.en: keen students
sentences.cn: 求知若渴的学生

sentences.en: LIlya is keen on dancing but her farther was not allow
sentences.cn: 莉亚热衷于舞蹈但是她父亲并不允许

sentences.en: Mr Honda was himself a keen racing driver in his younger days.
sentences.cn: 本田先生自己年轻时就是位热衷赛车的车手。

sentences.en: Mr Walsh has a keen appreciation of the priorities of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 沃尔什先生深刻理解选民最为关注的事项。

sentences.en: She has a keen eye for (= is good at noticing ) talent.
sentences.cn: 她擅于发掘人才。

sentences.en: She was new in the job and keen as mustard (= very keen ).
sentences.cn: 她刚开始做这工作，热情很高。

sentences.en: Steve was keen to get all the dirt he could on her.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫一心想要搜罗关于她的一切丑闻。

sentences.en: The kids in my class are all very keen.
sentences.cn: 我班上的学生都很好学。

sentences.en: The receivers are keen to sell the stores as one lot.
sentences.cn: 破产事务官想要将这些店铺打包整体出售。

sentences.en: There is expected to be a keen fight in the local elections.
sentences.cn: 预计地方选举的竞争会非常激烈。

sentences.en: Valentino is keen to see celebrities parading his clothes at big occasions.
sentences.cn: 瓦伦蒂诺喜欢看名人在重大场合展示他设计的服装。

sentences.en: We are not very keen on floral patterns and fussy designs.
sentences.cn: 我们不是很喜欢花卉图案和过于繁琐的设计。

sentences.en: We won the contest in the face of keen competition.
sentences.cn: 面对激烈的竞争，我们还是赢得了比赛。

words.tran_cn: 敏锐的，敏捷的；渴望的；强烈的；热心的；锐利的

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)极热心的，极热切的；极热情的

trans.tran_cn: 渴望的，热衷的，着迷的，敏捷的，强烈的，灵敏的，激烈的，低廉的，寒冷的，锋利的
trans.tran_en: wanting to do something or wanting something to happen very much
